channel.title: [718] Rune-Evo Login Error
channel.description:
I have been using the Rune-Evo source for a few weeks with no issues at all. But yesterday, when my friend logged in from his other house, it threw the following error.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZpKyJuZ.png[/img]
Since then, only I can log in. After loading a clean Rune-Evo source, we managed to get one other person to log in. But no one else can log in, or make a new account without that error. I've tried searching for an answer with no luck. How do I fix this?
LoginPacketsDecoder.java [Java] LoginPacketsDecoder.java - Pastebin.com
WorldPacketsDecoder.java [Java] WorldPacketsDecoder.java - Pastebin.com
LoginPacketsEncoder.java [Java] LoginPacketsEncoder.java - Pastebin.com
WorldPacketsDecoder.java [Java] WorldPacketsEncoder.java - Pastebin.com
Session.java [Java] Session.java - Pastebin.com
